title: $3000-3/1 Hollywood House-Great Neighborhood-Upgraded-Fenced Yard-Pets
posting_body: ['Sought out Hollywood Hills Rental!', 'Close to Joe DiMaggio Hospital.', '2/1 with a bonus room that can be used as a bedroom, craft room, play room or a gym.', 'All new finishes.', 'Large Fenced Backyard with access via alley.', 'Washer, Dryer and Shed will be available for tenant to use.', 'Tenant pays all utilities and lawn service.', 'Pets are allowed with purchase of Rental Insurance depending on breed and Pet deposit.', 'Priced to Rent Quickly.', 'THIS IS A YEARLY LEASE – NOT SHORT TERM.', 'Landlord requires First Month, Last Month and Security Deposit to move in (3 month’s rent).', ' Acceptable credit score/report for all persons on the lease (650+), background check and PROOF of income showing sustained combined incomes at least 3 times the amount of the monthly rent.', 'Must have no judgments or money owed to previous landlords.', 'Dianne Warren,', 'show contact info', ', Beachfront Realty.', ' Map view is approximate, not exact, for security reasons.', 'Please CALL to view this property.', ' No texts or emails for first contact.', ' Private owner property.']
